Package net.dean.jraw.auth

Classes to assist in the authentication of RedditClients.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthenticationListener
    A listener that is called whenever a RedditClient is authenticated.
    TokenStore
    Generalized interface for storing API tokens in a key-value fashion.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApatheticTokenStore
    A TokenStore implementation that disregards all calls to ApatheticTokenStore.writeToken(String, String), returns false for all calls to ApatheticTokenStore.isStored(String), and throws a NoSuchTokenException for all calls to ApatheticTokenStore.readToken(String).
    AuthenticationManager
    Helps developers manage the OAuth2 authentication process better, especially if the app will need to be reauthenticated using a refresh token.
    RefreshTokenHandler
    Handles the saving of refresh tokens.
    VolatileTokenStore
    Simple TokenStore that uses a Map.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AuthenticationState  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoSuchTokenException
    Thrown when trying to read a token in a TokenStore that does not exist

Package net.dean.jraw.auth Description

Classes to assist in the authentication of RedditClients.
